name: UK Bank - Open Banking - Public
description: This is a single toolbox for working with the public resources available as part of the UK Open Banking. These are all of the resources that do not require authentication, and are using the common UK Open Banking API format.

x-specifications.name: APIs.json
x-specifications.description: This toolbox uses an APIs.json file to index the entire set of APIs, and the specifications that define them. Providing a single machine readable index of all the moving parts of this industry toolbox, including the details of each API, but also everything that supports them.

x-specifications.name: OpenAPI
x-specifications.description: Postman leverages the OpenAPI specification as the contract for each API being delivered or consumed, providing a single definition for each API being delivered and put to work in applications and integrations.

x-specifications.name: JSON Schema
x-specifications.description: Postman uses JSON Schema to validate JSON objects as part of the API lifecycle, and the request and response for each API being delivered or consumed, as well as part of each OpenAPI contract being managed.

x-specifications.name: Postman Collections
x-specifications.description: Postman cocllections provide a machine readable representation of each APIs contracct, providing an executable representation of each API that can be used across the API lifecycle to mock, document, and test APIs.
